name: OneShot (itch) (Fire Plant Games)
description:
OneShot is a short FPS game where you play as a singular bullet. You can take control of robots and use them to shoot yourself at other robots to take them out! Take out all the enemies in a room to progress to the next. You win once you defeat all the robots in the level! This game was created following the theme "Only One", and submitted for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. It was developed within 48 hours. 

Full Credits;

Programming and Design: (Fire Plant Games) - Elijah Allen,

Art and Supporting Design: (Godfish) - Zac Bennett

Music: (floatingFast) - Gautam Srikishan
